content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I just started a webcomic about my love of Game of Thrones and my ink stained shirts.
Oh, that sounds really cool! What's it called?
It's called "The Ink Stained Knight". It's still in the early stages, but I'm really excited about it.
That's great! I'm sure it'll be a hit. I love Game of Thrones.
Thanks! Me too. It's one of my favorite shows.
That's a tough question. I think I'd have to say "The Rains of Castamere". That was such a powerful episode.
That was a great episode! I was so sad when Robb died.
Me too. But it was a really well-done episode.
Yeah, it was. I'm excited to see what happens in the next season.
Me too! I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to wait until it airs.
I know what you mean. I'm already counting down the days.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
